TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TypedTableBaseExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class TypedTableBaseExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含 类的扩展方法。

span.span: Contains the extension methods for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包含静态扩展方法的定义方法和标准查询操作的类型化数据集。The class contains static extension methods that define the method and standard query operations for typed data sets. 此类无法实例化。This class cannot be instantiated.

span.span: Standard Query Operators Overview
Querying Typed DataSets

span.span: The type of the row elements in source, .

param.name: source
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含要对其调用转换函数的 元素。

span.span: A that contains the elements to invoke a transformation function upon.

param.name: selector
param.span: 要应用于每个元素的转换函数。

span.span: A transformation function to apply to each element.

summary.span: 将 中的每个元素投影到新窗体。

span.span: Projects each element of a into a new form.

returns.span: 一个 ，其元素是对 的每个元素调用转换函数的结果。

span.span: An whose elements are the result of invoking the transformation function on each element of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法需要的转换函数`selector`，以便生成源序列中的每个值的一个值`source`。This projection method requires the transformation function, `selector`, to produce one value for each value in the source sequence, `source`. 如果`selector`返回一个值，本身就是一个集合，使用者必须手动遍历子序列。If `selector` returns a value that is itself a collection, the consumer must traverse the sub-sequences manually.
